author: Ehsanullah Amiri
title: Gunmen Storm International Hotel in Kabul - WSJ
text:
KABULâ€”Gunmen stormed an international hotel Saturday in Kabul, setting off a battle with government security forces, the Interior Ministry said.
A ministry spokesman, Najib Danish, provided no details on the number of gunmen or any casualties at the six-story Inter-Continental Hotel, which is on a prominent ridge in the west of the Afghan capital.
